results.title: Rose Hill: life on a string
results.creator_credit: Matt Blackwood, Csilla Csongvay, David Withers and ACMI
results.brief_description: Rose is a 90-year-old woman whose passion in life is puppetry, her studio in Mildura is filled with thousands of puppets, showcasing her family’s life long work. Rose introduced puppets to her four sons as a way to enhance their learning; this started a fascination for her son Ross, who became a world renowned puppeteer, working with Jim Henson on the film ‘Labyrinth’. Rose is an inspirational and vibrant woman who is still active in her community.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Matt Blackwood, Csilla Csongvay, David Withers and ACMI

results.title: Anything can happen in life
results.creator_credit: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.

results.title: Hooked on giving
results.creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore, David Withers and ACMI
results.brief_description: A small but dedicated group of volunteers provide vital emergency service to their local community. Murray Allomes has been the team leader of the Nangiloc/Colignan Community Emergency Response Team (CERT) for 7 years. The small team of volunteers ensure that if an emergency takes place in their district assistance is provided quickly and with care. Despite the serious nature of their role within the community there’s always time for a laugh and a yarn about the strange and wonderful moments they encounter on the job.
results.description: A small but dedicated group of volunteers provide vital emergency service to their local community. Murray Allomes has been the team leader of the Nangiloc/Colignan Community Emergency Response Team (CERT) for 7 years. The small team of volunteers ensure that if an emergency takes place in their district assistance is provided quickly and with care. Despite the serious nature of their role within the community there’s always time for a laugh and a yarn about the strange and wonderful moments they encounter on the job.

results.title: Sweet long ride
results.creator_credit: Linda Ellen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Laurie and Linda Ellen have taken holidays four times a year for the past thirty-four years. She reflects on the changes in their holidaying as well as some of the more enduring memories of their time away from home.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Linda Ellen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Not ready
results.creator_credit: Linh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: While Linh Nguyen is on the cusp of adulthood and taking the next step in her life, she reflects on a simpler, more carefree time and hopes for a time where she will gain greater clarity and certainty.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Linh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Swing Fitness for Older Adults
results.brief_description: This gentle, all new, swing movement video is designed specifically for the young at heart (30-80 years) who wish to keep supple, healthy and full of life with a minimum of effort and a maximum amount of enjoyment. If you are ready to begin exercising in the safest way possible, you are ready for this remarkable program.
